globalShortcuts.notes: SuccessFactors community discussions and best practices

notes.title: Performance Summary
notes.content:
"Summarize this employee's goal progress for [time period] and highlight their top 3 accomplishments in business language suitable for performance review discussion."

Example: "Summarize Jane Smith's goal progress for H1 2025 and highlight her top 3 accomplishments in business language I can use in our Q2 review conversation."

notes.title: Policy Explanation
notes.content:
"Explain [company policy] in simple terms for someone based in [country/region] and list the key actions they must take."

Example: "Explain our parental leave policy in simple terms for someone based in Germany and tell me the 3 key actions I must take before going on leave."

notes.title: Attrition Analysis
notes.content:
"Analyze regretted attrition in [scope] over [time period], identify top 3 drivers from exit interviews and performance data, then propose 3 retention initiatives with expected ROI and implementation timeline."

Example: "Analyze regretted attrition in my Sales organization over the last 12 months, identify top 3 drivers based on exit interviews and performance trends, then propose 3 retention initiatives with expected ROI (% reduction in attrition) and 90-day implementation timeline."

notes.title: Recruiting Optimization
notes.content:
"For [job family/role]: 1) Analyze candidate pipeline and time-to-fill trends for last 6 months, 2) Identify bottlenecks (sourcing, screening, offer acceptance), 3) Propose 3 specific actions to reduce time-to-hire by 20%, 4) Draft communication to hiring managers explaining changes."

Example: "For Software Engineering roles: 1) Analyze candidate pipeline and time-to-fill trends for last 6 months, 2) Identify bottlenecks at each recruiting stage, 3) Propose 3 specific actions to reduce time-to-hire from 45 to 36 days, 4) Draft communication to engineering managers explaining the new faster process."

notes.title: Production Access & Contacts
notes.content:
Production Environment:
https://your-company.sapsf.com
Company ID: YOUR_COMPANY_ID

Key Contacts:
- System Admin: admin@your-company.com
- HR Admin: hradmin@your-company.com
- Support: support@your-company.com

notes.title: Test User Accounts
notes.content:
Common Test Users:

test-employee:
- Username: employee@test.com
- Role: Employee

test-manager:
- Username: manager@test.com
- Role: Manager

test-admin:
- Username: admin@test.com
- Role: Administrator

notes.title: API Integration Reference
notes.content:
API Endpoints:

OData API:
https://api.successfactors.com/odata/v2/

Authentication:
- OAuth 2.0 (recommended)
- Basic Auth (legacy)

Rate Limits:
- 20,000 calls/hour
- 100 calls/minute burst

Documentation:
https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_SUCCESSFACTORS_PLATFORM/d599f15995d348a1b45ba5603e2aba9b/03e1fc3791684367a6a76a614a2916de.html
